title: MSstatsPPI
text: MSstatsPPI package member MSstats family packages. contains set functions interpretation mass spectrometry (MS) statistical analysis results context protein-protein interaction (PPI) networks. package designed used conjunction MSstats package. package provides function getSubnetworkFromIndra retrieves subnetwork PPIs INDRA database based differential abundance analysis results. function visualizeSubnetwork takes output getSubnetworkFromIndra visualizes subnetwork.
code: input <- data.table::fread(     system.file("processed_data/groupComparisonModel.csv",         package = "MSstatsPPI"     ) ) subnetwork <- getSubnetworkFromIndra(input) visualizeSubnetwork(subnetwork$nodes, subnetwork$edges)

title: Authors and Citation
text: Anthony Wu. Author, maintainer. Olga Vitek. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Wu , Vitek O (2024). MSstatsPPI: Protein-Protein Interaction Analysis MS-based Proteomics Experiments. R package version 0.1.0, https://vitek-lab.github.io/MSstatsPPI/, http://msstats.org.
code: @Manual{,   title = {MSstatsPPI: Protein-Protein Interaction Analysis for MS-based Proteomics Experiments},   author = {Anthony Wu and Olga Vitek},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 0.1.0, https://vitek-lab.github.io/MSstatsPPI/},   url = {http://msstats.org}, }

text: nodes dataframe nodes edges dataframe edges pvalue_cutoff p-value cutoff coloring significant proteins. Default 0.05 logfc_cutoff log fold change cutoff coloring significant proteins. Default 0.5
